name: ArchesWeather
description: AI-based weather forecasting model using a transformer architecture with Cross-Level Attention for efficient global weather prediction.

data_driven_details.architecture: 3D Swin U-Net transformer with Cross-Level Attention and adaptive Layer Normalization.
data_driven_details.training_data: Trained on ERA5 data regridded to 1.5º resolution from 1979 to 2018; fine-tuned on 2007-2018 data.

name: Aurora
description: Aurora is an AI-based model that generates global weather and air pollution forecasts. It utilizes 3D Swin Transformer architecture and is pre-trained on diverse atmospheric data.

data_driven_details.architecture: 3D Swin Transformer with 3D Perceiver-based encoders and decoders that uses an icosahedral internal grid.
data_driven_details.training_data: Pre-trained on a mixture of ERA5, CMCC, IFS-HR, HRES Forecasts, GFS Analysis, and GFS Forecasts data.

name: ClimaX
description: A foundation model for weather forecasting to and climate projections, using a vision transformer architecture.

data_driven_details.architecture: Vision Transformer (ViT) with variable tokenization and aggregation
data_driven_details.training_data: Pretrained on CMIP6 climate datasets and fine-tuned on ERA5 data for weather forecasting and climate tasks.

name: FengWu
description: AI-based global medium-range weather forecasting system using a multi-modal and multi-task learning approach, trained on ERA5 data to predict atmospheric conditions with 0.25° resolution.

data_driven_details.architecture: Multi-modal encoder-decoder with cross-modal Transformer and replay buffer mechanism
data_driven_details.training_data: Trained on ERA5 data from 1979 to 2018.

name: FourCastNet
description: Global AI-based weather forecasting model that uses Adaptive Fourier Neural Operators to produce high-resolution short to medium-range forecasts.

data_driven_details.loss_function: Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) and Anomaly Correlation Coefficient (ACC)
data_driven_details.architecture: Adaptive Fourier Neural Operator (AFNO) with Vision Transformer (ViT) backbone.
data_driven_details.training_data: Trained on ERA5 data from 1979 to 2018.

name: GraphCast
description: AI-based medium-range global weather forecasting with 3D neural networks.

data_driven_details.architecture: Graph Neural Network (GNN) in an encode-process-decode configuration with a multi-mesh graph representation.
data_driven_details.training_data: Trained on ERA5 data from 1979 to 2017, covering 227 weather variables across 37 pressure levels.

name: Pangu-Weather
description: AI-based global weather forecasting system that uses a 3D Earth-specific transformer architecture to provide short to medium-range forecasts.

data_driven_details.loss_function: Latitude-weighted Root Mean Square Error (RMSE) and Anomaly Correlation Coefficient (ACC)
data_driven_details.architecture: 3D Earth-specific transformer (3DEST) with hierarchical temporal aggregation
data_driven_details.training_data: Trained on 43 years of global hourly data from the ERA5 reanalysis dataset, focusing on five upper-air atmospheric variables and four surface weather variables across 13 pressure levels.
